text: Well I m lonely now    Hey guys  I know this pandemic has bard a bit hard on us all  but one thing I d like to point out is how we aren t really physically socializing with our friends  Thank the lord for technology  and other stuff that helps us communicate  and have fun  Recently I started to build a   dollar gaming pc of my own  because a couple of my friends had been doing this recently  and have been playing on them  I m   overweight  and not too good looking tbh  I asked my friends what games I should play with them after I m done  I know we started school again  and are way more busy  but they said they don t really play anymore  There have also been way too many times on the weekend were they said they could play  but then alter they just say eh I don t really want to  I m a little lonely right now ngl  I just wanted to share that loneliness is real  and it can be something to consider serious  My parents tell me to do a bunch of chores when I m bored  and sometimes I m so bored I might actually do them  I ve just been feeling so lonely these past couple of weeks and thought I d share to the perfect place where depression is cared for  This subreddit
